course_description: This course covers how the atmosphere, oceans and land work together to produce the characteristics of the planet, how this synergy has changed in the past, and how human activity affects the system.
prerequisites: This course requires ENVS 131 or ENVS_OX 131 or  BIOL_OX 111 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite OR permission of instructor.
schedule_location: TTh 10am-11:15am in Math & Science Center - W502
sections: Class Nbr: 2902, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: S. Donaher, Status: Open
